name: NAN AL 110
description:
Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk

 

Nestlé® NAN® AL 110™ is a Lactose Free special Dietary Formula especially designed for the dietary management of lactose tolerance/ mal-digestion during & after diarrhea and can be given from Birth onwards in accordance with the advise of Medical professionals.

 

Nestlé® NAN® AL 110™ contains:

- Probiotic L. reuteri which shortens the duration of diarrhea by promoting healthy gut flora.

- Lactose free which is effective for managing lactose intolerance. It contains glucose polymers as a source of carbohydrate which is low in osmolality and is easily digested and absorbed during diarrhea.

- Nucleotides which supports the recovery of damaged gut, shorten the duration and reduce the severity of diarrhea.

- Balanced ratio of DHA and ARA which plays an essential role in immunity.

 

Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack

 

Manufactured by Nestlé Philippines Ltd.

Marketed by Nestlé Bangladesh Ltd.

name: NAN OPTIPRO-1 TIN
description:
Description

This Nestlé NAN OPTIPRO 1 Infant Formula Milk Powder will support your baby’s good health, growth and happiness during early childhood.

  • This is is an Infant Formula with OPTI PRO designed for infants from birth onwards when they are not breastfed
  • Prepared with essential vitamins and minerals
  • OPTIPRO®, an optimized protein blend exclusively to NAN® that is unique in both quality and amount. It supplies an adequate amount of proteins needed for your baby’s optimal growth without overloading immature organs.
  • BIFIDUS BL is a probiotic culture that helps to reinforce the baby’s defense system.
  • DHA and ARA, two special fatty acids found in breast milk, which are important for your baby’s immune defense system and contribute to the development of the brain and vision.
  • Developed by combining blend of ingredients with unique process
  • Support your baby to grow in body and mind
  • Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack
  • Important Notice: Breastfeeding (Mother’s milk) is best for babies

name: NAN OPTIPRO-2 TIN
description:
Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk

 

Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 2 is an Follow-up Formula with OPTIPRO designed for infants after 6 months onwards as the liquid part of the diet during and after weaning, in addition to other foods. It is not to be used as a breast milk substitute during the first 6 months of life.

 

Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 2 contains:

- OPTIPRO®, an optimized protein blend exclusively to NAN® that is unique in both quality and amount. It supplies the adequate amount of proteins needed for your baby’s optimal growth without overloading immature organs.

- BIFIDUS BL is a probiotic culture that helps to reinforce baby’s defense system.

- DHA and ARA, two special fatty acids found in breast milk, which are important for your baby’s immune defense system and contribute to the development of brain and vision.

 

Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack

 

Manufactured by Nestlé Philippines Ltd.

Marketed by Nestlé Bangladesh Ltd.

name: MAGGI Saad E Magic (12 pcs Combo)
description:
Description:

  • MAGGI Shaad-e Magic is an all-in-one seasoning added at the final stage of cooking. Being the first of its kind in Bangladesh, MAGGI Shaad-e Magic is a unique blend of roasted spices which can enhance the taste of everyday dishes. It captures well-known Bangladeshi spices such as cumin, chilli, turmeric, garlic which enriches the taste of a wide variety of traditional Bangladeshi dishes. This easy to use product, is fortified with vital nutrients such as vitamin A, Iron and Iodine.

name: MAGGI Fried Rice Seasoning
description:
Transforms your plain rice into a delicious wok flavored fried rice.

 

A unique blend of different spices & flavors like Garlic, black pepper, Soya sauce & unique Asian wok flavor

 

It’s very easy to cook, you just need to fry one onion in a fry pan with one table spoon oil & then add plain rice and Fried rice seasoning mix. Then mix & stir it for 2-3 minutes. Your Fried rice is ready!

 

For more nutrition you can add Carrot, Broccoli, Capsicum and also scrambled egg.

 

Net Weight: 6g

 

Origin: Bangladesh

name: MAGGI Soya Sauce
description: Maggi is a dark, strong, concentrated cooking sauce produced commercially and sold in bottles. It is a thin sauce, with the consistency of soy sauce or Worcestershire sauce, which it looks like. It is a hydrolysed vegetable protein-based sauce used as a substitute for meat flavouring. The taste of soy sauce is predominated by saltiness, followed by moderate umami, sweet taste, and finally slight bitterness, which is hard to perceive due to the masking effect of other tastes.
